1049020.name: MORDHAU - Supporter Pack
1049020.description:
A package of goods for those who wish to go the extra mile to support the developers of MORDHAU.

Includes:


  • MORDHAU Soundtrack
  • Medallion (in-game wearable cosmetic)
  • Mercenary in-game banner

MORDHAU Soundtrack:

Composed by Viktor Alexander, Lukas Gorris and Paul Keilhau. Total length is 76 minutes and 51 seconds.
  • 01 - Main Theme (10:40)
  • 02 - Taiga (08:03)
  • 03 - Feitoria (08:16)
  • 04 - Contraband (08:25)
  • 05 - Tourney (08:06)
  • 06 - Camp (08:06)
  • 07 - Mountain Peak (08:06)
  • 08 - The Pit (08:11)
  • 09 - Grad (08:58)

NOTE: If you would like to purchase just the soundtrack directly from the composers, you can do that on Bandcamp.

You'll find the medallion in the shoulder slot when customizing your character. The mercenary banner will appear in the player menu, where the other banners are.
1049020.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
